pullrequest.title: Update atlas images in drcsim launchfile options tutorial

content.raw:
How about we use Steve's image from his PR that allows multiple Atlases? I photoshopped the first image together before the GPU laser collision bug was fixed, and the background looks pretty crappy.

![3393357641-atlas evolution.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RMMxjX/images/3421927203-3393357641-atlas_evolution.png)
content.html: How about we use Steve's image from his PR that allows multiple Atlases? I photoshopped the first image together before the GPU laser collision bug was fixed, and the background looks pretty crappy.
